headline: How Recent Moves Are Rewriting The Story For Fox (FOXA)
summary: Fox’s latest valuation work keeps the Fair Value estimate steady at US$74.94, so the modelled intrinsic value level is unchanged even as views on risk and reward evolve. That stability comes alongside fresh analyst commentary, where more optimistic voices point to sports rights, betting tie ins and upcoming events, while more cautious ones focus on linear TV pressure and cost risks. As you read on, you will see how these cross currents shape the evolving Fox narrative and what to watch next...

headline: BofA cuts Fox stock, seen as the most exposed name to the upcoming NFL renewal
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America downgraded Fox shares in a note on Wednesday, warning that the broadcaster faces the steepest risks in the looming National Football League media rights negotiations.
